Question.Subject: Anyone have a good recipe for an empanada cordobes?
Question.Content: How about empanadas arabes or other empanadas from that area of Argentina?

ChosenAnswer:
Yes. Here it is right here.
1 cup of empanadas 1 cup of arabes 1 cup of other empanadas 1 cup of from that area of Argentina
MIX IT ALL UP THEN POOP IN IT
The End

Answers.Answer: It's just like cooking kidney, just boil the piss out of it
